data.title: 35th Annual GLAAD Media Awards Nominees
data.meta_description: See the full list of nominees for the 35th Annual GLAAD Media Awards.
data.meta_site_name: GLAAD | GLAAD rewrites the script for LGBTQ acceptance.
data.text:

The Barbara Gittings Award for Excellence in LGBTQ Media will be presented to +Life Media.
